import React from 'react'; import styles from "./Form.module.scss"; import Input from "../Input/Input"; import Button from "../Button/Button"; import Title from "../Title/Title"; const types = { Links: 'Links', Articles: 'Articles', Notes: 'Notes', } const description = { Links: 'Link', Articles: 'Article', Notes: 'Note', } class Form extends React.Component { state = { activeOption: types.Links, } handle = (type) => { this.setState({ activeOption: type, }) } render(){ return (
Add New {description[this.state.activeOption]}
this.handle(types.Links)} /> this.handle(types.Articles)} /> this.handle(types.Notes)} /> {/*
